contentrichtext.text: {{enzyme | Name = quercetin 3-O-methyltransferase | EC_number = 2.1.1.76 | CAS_number = 75603-21-3 | IUBMB_EC_number = 2/1/1/76 | GO_code = 0030755 | image = | width = | caption = }} In [[enzymology]], a '''quercetin 3-O-methyltransferase''' ({{EC number|2.1.1.76}}) is an [[enzyme]] that [[catalysis|catalyzes]] the [[chemical reaction]] :S-adenosyl-L-methionine + 3,5,7,3',4'-pentahydroxyflavone <math>\rightleftharpoons</math> S-adenosyl-L-homocysteine + 3-methoxy-5,7,3',4'-tetrahydroxyflavone Thus, the two [[substrate (biochemistry)|substrates]] of this enzyme are [[S-Adenosyl methionine|S-adenosyl methionine]] and [[3,5,7,3',4'-pentahydroxyflavone]], whereas its two [[product (chemistry)|products]] are [[S-adenosylhomocysteine]] and [[3-methoxy-5,7,3',4'-tetrahydroxyflavone]]. This enzyme belongs to the family of [[transferase]]s, specifically those transferring one-carbon group methyltransferases. The systematic name of this enzyme class is '''S-adenosyl-L-methionine:3,5,7,3',4'-pentahydroxyflavone 3-O-methyltransferase'''. Other names in common use include '''flavonol 3-O-methyltransferase''', and '''flavonoid 3-methyltransferase'''. This enzyme participates in [[flavonoid biosynthesis]]. ==References== {{reflist|1}} * {{cite journal | author = Foucher AL, McIntosh A, Douce G, Wastling J, Tait A, Turner CM | date = 2006 | title = A proteomic analysis of arsenical drug resistance in Trypanosoma brucei | journal = Proteomics. | volume = 6 | pages = 2726–32 | pmid = 16526094 | doi = 10.1002/pmic.200500419 | issue = 9 }} * {{cite journal | author = De Luca V, Ibrahim RK | date = 1985 | title = Enzymatic synthesis of polymethylated flavonols in Chrysosplenium americanum. I. Partial purification and some properties of S-adenosyl-L-methionine:flavonol 3-, 6-, 7-, and 4'-O-methyltransferases | journal = Arch. Biochem. Biophys. | volume = 238 | pages = 596–605 | pmid = 3994393 | doi = 10.1016/0003-9861(85)90205-X | issue = 2 }} * {{cite journal | author = De Luca V, Ibrahim RK | date = 1985 | title = Enzymatic synthesis of polymethylated flavonols in Chrysosplenium americanum. II. Substrate interaction and product inhibition studies of flavonol 3-, 6-, and 4'-O-methyltransferases | journal = Arch. Biochem. Biophys. | volume = 238 | pages = 606–18 | pmid = 3994394 | doi = 10.1016/0003-9861(85)90206-1 | issue = 2 }} * {{cite journal | author = Ibrahim RK and De Luca V | date = 1982 | title = Polymethylated flavonol synthesis is catalyzed by distinct O-methyltransferases | journal = Naturwissenschaften | volume = 69 | issue = 1 | pages = 41–42 | doi = 10.1007/BF00441101 }} {{transferase-stub}} [[Category:EC 2.1.1]] [[Category:Enzymes of unknown structure]] [[Category:Quercetin]] [[Category:Flavonols metabolism]] [[Category:O-Methylated flavonoids metabolism]]
